SLEEPERS, TERRORISTS, REMOTE VIEWING, RITs AND THE NET Following the October 1999 classi fied dispensation, the GA infrequently provided bits of additional non-specific information pertaining to various Fallen Angelic/Intruder ET and Illuminati intentions, such as Psychotronically triggered Illuminati terrorist acts, including the use of Bio - terrorism. I was told, in various brief personal discussions with GA members in 1999 and early 2000, that there were “Illuminati Sleeper groups” (unnamed and unidentified) of various nationalities scattered within about 15 major (unnamed) countries. They said world governments knew since their beginning formation in the 1960s-1980s that the various “Sleeper” Terrorists Groups existed and had most of them already under constant surveillance. The “Sleepers” were intended as the eventual targets of Psychotronic ''Triggering'' launched by the Zeta-Dracos-Anunnaki Fallen Angelic collectives if their OWO Master Plan progressed beyond
